tool_description: Access real-time information on the world's billionaires, including rankings, net worth, and detailed profiles with the Forbes Billionaires API.
name: Forbes Billionaires API
title: Forbes Billionaires API

api_list.name: Billionaire Details
api_list.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific billionaire, including current and historical net worth, personal statistics, wealth history, and interesting facts, offering an in-depth profile of each billionaire on the Forbes list.

api_list.name: List of Billionaires
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of billionaires with their current rankings, sources of wealth, and net worth, providing a comprehensive overview of the world's wealthiest individuals.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forbes-billionaires-api.p.rapidapi.com/list.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forbes-billionaires-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://forbes-billionaires-api.p.rapidapi.com/list.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forbes-billionaires-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
